website_summaries.verdict: We love this powerful yet maneuverable compactor that is well-suited for patio, walkway and landscaping jobs. Affordable yet durable.
pros: Forward movement rate is excellent, helping jobs go faster
Powerful engine produces 5,400 blows per minute while vibration reduction features aid operator
Easy to maneuver thanks in part to a unique swing-over handle and compact, contoured edge plate
cons: Heavier than most models but has central loading bar

customer_reviews.title: 35 years as a General Contractor. Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it five stars because of the price. Don’t listen to reviews from non-professionals. A General Contractor for 35 years, I’ve ran every compactor since1968 and this compactor is legit. Someone gave it 1 star because of the gas cap. I had no problem fueling it with a FIVE gallon can with a big spout. Just finished a 5 hr nonstop session, same performance of the $2500 model I use. I’m going to buy 2 more. If it breaks I’ll edit this review, but it is built pretty well for the money. Buy it, I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: R. Rockman

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Packaging protected the unit very well. Cardboard box took a few hits. It is a little tough on anything not level. Still workable but you have to horse it around a bit. It does not like powdery soil. It bogs a bit. I am using mine on a section of road base. Does a fine job. It said that it is not recommended on clay soils. I have a section of clay I am going to use it on. I will just have to work with it. Starts easily. Just like anything else that shakes a lot. You need to check the bolts once in a while. Oil fills faster than expected. I do like this compactor.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry F.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The compactor was delivered over a week later than originally stated because they didn’t have any trucks driving out to my area until the following week. Then it stopped working after the second use. The oil smells like gasoline and it won’t start, so I’m not sure if there is a leak or what. So now I have a machine that won’t work, a rock patio that still needs to be compacted, a hot tub sitting in my driveway because it can’t go in the yard until the patio is done, and no idea what I’m going to do. Really disappointed. I do not recommend this product. Just go rent one.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Best price and worked great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, starts right up on first try. Used on large backyard paver project and it was awesome. I also bought their paver pad to avoid breaking pavers when I had finished compacting gravel. Sold for more than I purchased it for after ending my project, saved money over renting and I could use it on my schedule. Very happy, durable compactor, liked the handles as it is heavy to move or load into a truck
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal on a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Be ready, it's heavy - which it needs to be to do the job. This was worth it because we have a few new paving projects, plus we want to repair the ruts in our gravel driveway. We did buy the companion pad for finishing our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is good compactor and better than my harbor fright compators
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: worth it. just make sure you seal the air ...
customer_reviews.text: worth it. just make sure you seal the air filter port with silicone where the wing nut is located. left outside in rain water got inside carb.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M Maruca

customer_reviews.title: Met my Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Plate tamper met my expectations. Very sturdy and well built machine. One suggestion to WEN is they offer a set of wheels or a dolly for transporting the plate compactor around a jobsite. At 200+ pounds it requires two people to pick it up and move it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compactor
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. Just have to grind bottom two side edges rounded slightly to keep from digging in! Starts first pull every time. Just shut gas off when done and run carb dry. Keeps it from gumming up. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We were a little bit sceptical to buy it at first but so far this things is working great! Really convenient to have if delivered at home.
customer_reviews.author: LimG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, well pleased
customer_reviews.text: (I don’t usually review) I bought this for doing concrete prep work. I read a few good reviews and anything I could find used in my area was roughly the same price as this machine brand new. I’ve probably put 10 good hours on it and it still purrs like a kitten. For a homeowner or small contractor who will use it here and there (like me) it’s totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: A Great Packer
customer_reviews.text: Great machine,starts on the first pull.Bigger than I expected a very nice job it does.had no issues with it so far, ran it all day. I would recommend this plate compactor for any size job you might have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: The packer arrived just as stated and was easy to set up. It started right away and works great. Some mentioned about the gas fill was right under the pickup support which is true but it doesn't make any difference. It's easy to fill from either side.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Tools

customer_reviews.title: Reliable compactor, good value
customer_reviews.text: Adding 2700 sq ft to our back patio which required 130 tons of fill and lots of compacting. The compactor worked perfectly. It is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mock

customer_reviews.title: and it floods very easy if you move it while not running
customer_reviews.text: Well working machine, but not very well built. The bolts holding the exhaust on sheared off day 2, and it floods very easy if you move it while not running. You almost have to turn fuel off every time you readjust position or move around to another spot.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Ordered one day the next day it was delivered it ran fine it compacted what I needed and I have more use for it now
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one day the next day it was delivered it ran fine it compacted what I needed and I have more use for it now
customer_reviews.author: john becker

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This works very good. I love it. Engine starts easily. It does the compacting well. Good quality! Highly recommended for the quality and the cost!
customer_reviews.author: HV-Mass

customer_reviews.title: Ran it at least 10 hours works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this to compact 40x80 pole barn pad. Worked great. Always started and ran. It is heavy so need at least 2 to pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Northvillejam

customer_reviews.title: This is decent for the price. It compacted 3/4 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is decent for the price. It compacted 3/4 process as well as an $1800.00 model. The main complaint that I have relates to plate design. The sides tend to dig a small rut when you turn. It is not a huge deal but beveled plate sides may cure that. Overall, it is worth the money. If you use it for 4-5 projects it is cheaper to buy this than to rent one.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Barhorst

customer_reviews.title: We used it today and it works fine. The frame is very substantial as we used ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical about purchasing this compactor because the price was much lower than other comparable machines. We used it today and it works fine. The frame is very substantial as we used a chain and hook to lift it into the work area. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: Pulleys on both that I purchased blew out! Yes we use them daily needed 2 for just foundation compaction for the prep guys and they both are broke! I’ll never buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Jason Testa

customer_reviews.title: great price for thisw solid unit
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy unit and at a much better cost to the big box stores for similar plate compactor, has added lifting handles and a lifting ring fora hoist of some sort
customer_reviews.author: rebelbah

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my first project. Definitely a heavy quality machine. Set-up was easy but take your time adding the oil (which you need to purchase separately) because it fills up faster than expected. Fires up with easy pull and moves on its own once set to compact. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pile of junk
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it’s a pile of junk the bolts holding the handle snapped right off. Now I have to drill them out because the nut is welded to the inside. It’s a cheap design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good quality, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Works well, very good quality, excellent value. I'm using it for a couple of months for a project, then resell as used for 1/2 price, and save a bunch on rental fees and hassles.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Hahaha, these other reviews gotta be fake
customer_reviews.text: Whomever approved the final design on this red turd definitely rode the short bus. The fuel cap is mounted directly under the frame crossbar/ picking support. So plan on spilling alot of gas when refueling or use a really small funnel. Also the side plates have no bevel or radius so it digs in ALOT when turning. Lastly the throttle control is a joke at best . From 0-50% rpm, there is no vibration at all. From 50-75% throttle is where the vibration is variable, but not by much. Go rent one or spend a few extra bucks on a well thought out unit.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the compactor once so far but I am impressed with the performance. It starts easy and does a great job with the task at hand. Definitely a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Panorama Mgt.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I’ve had it for eight months now. The only problem is that the exhaust heat shield bolts have vibrated loss and are lost. I hope it actually has 4500 lbs compact force.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy Neuman

customer_reviews.title: which is great for compacting
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well and does what it is intended to do. This is a very heavy unit, which is great for compacting, but can be rather difficult to turn or go up any kind of incline.
customer_reviews.author: fu*k amazon2

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 30 minutes before the vibrator ball bearings disintergrated
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I found new bearings and have the tools and knowledge to repair it. No luck contacting WEN.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: I really good machine. Hits hard so good compaction
customer_reviews.text: I really good machine. Hits hard so good compaction. I feel at a good price. I'm looking for longevity. I can't tell you about that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl D.Mangrum Sr.

customer_reviews.title: good tamper for the money
customer_reviews.text: Started on first pull and has plenty of power to tamp new pavers. Good tool for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Caldarola

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off !
customer_reviews.text: Finally made time to use it, and it wont start. Never been used, Brand new and it needs a new coil?
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed so far, of the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed so far, of the quality of the unit for the price. It is half the cost of a higher quality, brand name compactor, but if it lasts through even four jobs, it will have more than paid for its self. I rented a similar plate a couple of weeks ago for two days and ran it for a total of six hours within those two days. it cost me $215.00, and the hassle of picking it up and getting it back on time. It really only holds 16oz of oil and not 20oz as stated in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: ... used it for about 10 hrs now and I like it. I would buy another if I need ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for about 10 hrs now and I like it .I would buy another if I need one so far I'm happy with the unit
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: started up right away, only used 2 times but had no problems at all..
customer_reviews.author: tmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Very kind and responsible
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and super resonables at the time of delivery
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Diaz

customer_reviews.title: My shoulders are sure happier now.
customer_reviews.text: Man why did I wait so long in getting this. The only thing I wish was different would be a two direction unit but I knew this wasn't. If I was to ever need another that is all I would change. My shoulders are sure happier now....
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hill

customer_reviews.title: The compactor works great, even my wife uses it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this compactor to compact a pad and fill for landscaping blocks. The compactor works great, even my wife uses it. We unloaded it from the crate, put gas in it and it started on the first pull. I had an issue with a weld breaking on the handle. I contacted Customer Service at Wen, through Amazon and they replied within 12 hours. I told them the issue and they promptly sent a replacement. I love this machine and Wen.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: runs great, easy to start and packs crush an run solid !!
customer_reviews.author: robert anuszewski

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price. As stated by others, ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price. As stated by others, it is very heavy. Sure beats renting a compactor when you have a project that is going to be spread out over a number of phases. I have used it to compact the back fill around our house, installing landing pavers, and driveway stone. Will be using it during garage construction and the the installation of walkway and patio pavers in the coming months. I would buy this compactor again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Has been working awesome since I bought it last fall
customer_reviews.text: Has been working awesome since I bought it last fall. Used it about 20 times. Compacts the gravel well, and cheap enough compared to renting one several times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I have only put about 11 hours of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have only put about 11 hours of use on this thing, but it has already paid for itself in rental costs. If you are looking for a plate compactor. I wouldn't be worried about buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: aaron olson

customer_reviews.title: Vibrating Assembly Flew Apart
customer_reviews.text: Vibrating assembly flew apart after owning little over one year. Used to build my sidewalk, small patio and retaining wall. I didn't fill the gas tank more than 15 times and I am disappointed that this part didn't last longer. I am hoping that the replacement part I ordered last longer. Really can't say I don't like it or it is okay at this point but will report back if there are issues with part.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Although I chose I love it, the compactor works good as described
customer_reviews.text: Although I chose I love it, the compactor works good as described. I only have 1 hour on the unit. the clutch bearing seal has failed, and coated the clutch shoes with grease. the clutch does not engage, just slips. I used brake cleaner to clean the clutch shoes and clutch drum. I was able to use for 20 more minutes and the clutch started slipping again. I am going to contact wen in hopes of receiving a replacement clutch. jason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The compactor uncrated and assembled easily. The instructions say to add 20 oz
customer_reviews.text: The compactor was crated well and delivery was timely. The compactor uncrated and assembled easily. The instructions say to add 20 oz. of oil, but it only took 16 oz., which caused for spillage from overfilling and oil had to be drained down to appropriate level. The compactor fired right up on first pull and runs like a champ. The compaction power is great, but the plate edges do leave a rut which requires going back to rake the materials back out. This product is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chet A. Dube

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unit works very well. Starts on the first pull typically. Make certain to fill with oil first.
customer_reviews.author: John D Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Just got this machine, put in some oil in the engine and it fired right up. It compacts very well and I am excited not spend anymore time and money going to rent one..
customer_reviews.author: Richard Weil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: side of plate cut is to deep into gravel . It should have curved up sides
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Runs real well but when compacting it pushes the material ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs real well but when compacting it pushes the material out from under it when turning corners it leaves a berm of material instead of compacting it down
customer_reviews.author: matthew gleason

customer_reviews.title: WEN 56035 Construction Zone Plate Compactor,...
customer_reviews.text: just great, it works just great, I have wanted one for years, now all I can say is, why didn't I do this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: rare101

product_meta.title: WEN 56035 Construction Zone 4,496-Pound Capacity Plate Compactor, Vibratory Asphalt/Soil Plate
product_meta.description: Style:DiscontinuedForget about spending money to rent a plate compactor. With a price this good and equipment this reliable, buying a compactor for the job site has never made more sense. A must have tool for anyone working on walkways, patios, paver installations, landscaping or small asphalt projects. Powerful 212cc/7hp engine delivers 4,496lbs of force at 5,400 blows per minute, increasing the density of loose granular soils, gravel, sand, crushed aggregate and other mediums into a sound, level foundation. This type of foundation extends the life of your project as it reduces water seepage, swelling and expansion. Our unique swing-over handle makes it easy to maneuver around the work area even in narrow, cramped spaces. Our engine features an angled combustion chamber (for more power per displacement), a pull recoil start and a low-oil shutdown to protect the engine. Vibration isolators between the welded steel plate and the engine reduce vibration, extending the engine's life. High density foam in the handles also reduces vibration to the user. One-gallon fuel tank provides ample work time. Tough powder coat finish keeps the product rust free. One-year limited warranty, 90 day commercial.
feature_bullets: Powerful: 212cc engine is larger than most in its class, producing 4,496lbs of force at 5,400 blows per minute
Maneuverable with our unique swing-over handle and the compact 24 x 17-3/4" contoured edge plate
Fast Travel Speed = productivity; Single direction plate travels up to 82 feet per minute
Vibration isolators between the welded steel plate and the engine reduce vibration extending the engine's life
Easily transportable with lift handles at the plate, as well as central lifting/load bar

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars122 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
